title: Ivory or Elephants
description: Ivory has been used to create jewelry, art, piano keys, and many other items. But do you know where ivory comes from and the impact it has on elephants? Ivory or Elephants explains both how ivory is harvested and the toll this practice has taken on elephants. This book can also be used to help teach students how to determine cause-and-effect relationships and recognize the importance of captions.
